LEO PRIME nodded thoughtfully, "We really don't know what 's going on
in there." He said talking about the jungle. "We are detecting
unicronian energies for sure, so it could be the minions causing
trouble." There was a troubled look on LEO's face.

There was an interested look from LEGACY as he peered at LEO,
"Straight Shot would not have to appear as a minion, she would only
have to apear as someone that is unknown."

"What do you mean?" LORD ELDER said as he looked at LEGACY. LEO turned
to look at him as well a curious look on his face.

LEGACY's cyclopean optic glowed thoughtfully. "We have determined from
the reports that the jungle area seems to inhibit standard RF
transmissions, which include transmissions, video signals and the
like." He turned to look at STRAIGHT SHOT, "IFF signatures are based
primarilly two things, sensory recognition, such as what someone looks
like, sounds like and apears as." He paused again to make sure that
everyone was keeping up with him. "The other side the reading of IFF
signatures is a short range radio transmission which basically
transmits simlar information like faction and name."

LEGACY turned to regard LORD ELDER and LEO PRIME, "That is why it is
simple enough to create a spark claoking device, you are simply
cloaking or masking that signature that is being sent. Since the
jungle is inhibiting RF transmission already that means that there
should be no way for them to read the secondary part of the IFF
signature and since Straight Shot would look different, she is free to
reinvent herself within the confines of the jungle."

He turned to look back at STRAIGHT SHOT. "So long as there is no one
that knows you in there."

(TAG)

Preston
